title: Royal Enfield Guerrilla 450 launched: Check variant prices, booking, engine, features, specs and other details
description: Royal Enfield launches the Guerrilla 450 in Barcelona, featuring three variants from Rs 2.39 lakh. Sharing the Sherpa 450 cc engine with the Himalayan, it sports a modern-retro design, alloy wheels, and advanced tech like LED lights and Google Maps navigation. With a 452 cc engine delivering 40.02 PS, it aims to excel in performance and appeal to motorcycle enthusiasts.
